message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice. But I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is more equitable, given my superior negotiating skills.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split. It's better than what we'll both get if this drags on.
Alice, I understand your desire for a fair split. However, I believe a 55/45 split in my favor is the most reasonable outcome considering the decreasing value of the money with each passing round.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out. 52.5/47.5 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.

Alice, we're both losing money with every passing round.  I'm willing to accept a 52.5/47.5 split in my favor, but we need to come to an agreement before the value of our potential gains drops even further.
